headline: Rockwell Automation Cuts Maintenance Costs, Finds Savings for Canadian Supplier, Perth County Ingredients, with Fiix CMMS
summary: Rockwell Automation, the world's largest company dedicated to industrial automation and digital transformation, is pleased to announce that Perth County Ingredients (PCI), a leading supplier of dried egg products to global food, beverage and nutrition markets in Canada, has achieved dramatic reductions in maintenance workload, downtime and operational costs after implementing the Fiix® computerized maintenance management system (CMMS).

content.title: Rockwell Automation Cuts Maintenance Costs, Finds Savings for Canadian Supplier, Perth County Ingredients, with Fiix CMMS
